original_text: Whenever they saw that there was a large amount of money in the chest, the royal secretary and the high priest came, counted the money that had been brought into the temple of the Lord and put it into bags.
korean_text: 이에 그 궤 가운데 은이 많은 것을 보면 왕의 서기와 대제사장이 올라와서 여호와의 성전에 있는 대로 그 은을 계산하여 봉하고

sentences.original_text: Whenever they saw that there was a large amount of money in the chest
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 궤에 많은 돈이 있는 것을 볼 때마다

sentences.original_text: the royal secretary and the high priest came
counted the money that had been brought into the temple of the Lord
